channel.title: Comments on: Lily Allen Twitters tickets away, chats with Kimmel

item.title: By: anonymous
item.dc:creator: anonymous
item.description: Kimmel really didn't do his research, because Lily Allen had, at this point already filed and was given, a restraining order against the paparazzi. The last was one of three incidents with the paps. 1. hit by a paparazzi in her car. 2. Almost run over by a paparazzi, while walking in London. 3. Almost collided with a bus, trying to avoid a paparazzi, while on the way to her Nan's funeral. Of course Lily Allen doesn't enjoying being in the tabloids, but she can not very well tell people that it's a problem, just something she has to except. Again she is filing a lawsuit against a tabloid magazine, for misquoted drug remarks. Her image in the tabloids have become less aggressive, at this point, so Kimmel should have avoided the subject all together.

The last was one of three incidents with the paps. 1. hit by a paparazzi in her car. 2. Almost run over by a paparazzi, while walking in London. 3. Almost collided with a bus, trying to avoid a paparazzi, while on the way to her Nan’s funeral. Of course Lily Allen doesn’t enjoying being in the tabloids, but she can not very well tell people that it’s a problem, just something she has to except. Again she is filing a lawsuit against a tabloid magazine, for misquoted drug remarks. Her image in the tabloids have become less aggressive, at this point, so Kimmel should have avoided the subject all together.
